header.headertext: AMENDMENTS TO BE MOVED IN COMMITTEE

text.quote: 000: Clause 2, page 2, line 7, after “secretary” insert “or in the six months prior to a general election to the salaried Leader of the Opposition and those Opposition members in receipt of financial support”
000: Clause 27, page 14, line 44, leave out “£5,000” and insert “£14,000”
000: Clause 27, page 14, line 45, leave out “£2,000” and insert “£7,000”

000: Clause 43, page 50, line 45, at end insert “except that for as long as Northern Ireland is governed by a statutory power sharing executive based upon the Good Friday Agreement, Part 2 shall not apply to Northern Ireland”
